actionUnits.condition: Call AnchorVisuals.OnAnchorExit without a prior enter to cover the null coroutine branch. MonoBehaviour_0 on Teleport Anchor (m_Script: fileID 11500000, guid b2dd7fabdb14fca498bd9e0def11ab19) config: m_FadeAnimation(fileID 8970193181346821320), m_Arrow(fileID 8134302612814971439), m_TargetArrowHeight=1, m_ArrowAnimationDuration=0.375, m_AnimationCurve as serialized.
Simulate teleport interactor hover enter to start fade-in and arrow rise animation. MonoBehaviour component in scene is the settings for Unity.VRTemplate.AnchorVisuals (guid b2dd7f...).

Simulate teleport interactor hover exit before animation completes to cover StopCoroutine non-null branch and play fade-out reverse at 1.5x speed.
Simulate actual teleport activation to hide the arrow visual per AnchorVisuals.HideArrowOnTeleport.
